title: Srivaru Motors unveils electric bike PRANA 2.0; targets to sell 10,000 units
description: Srivaru Motors is backed by NASDAQ-listed SRIVARU Holding Ltd in the United States and had introduced its maiden product -- an electric motorcycle PRANA in 2021 with a total capital infusion of USD 15 million, Ramasamy said during an interaction.
